name: Out of Gas (itch) (mortalfosca, Yamanefe, Lunaxolotl)
description:
A game about driving and fuel efficiency.

Try to go as far as possible without running out of gas.

You will eventually fail, but delaying that is up to you!

There are station scattered around to help you out during your journey.

Feel free to choose between two different vehicles on the start screen.

Tips: Try to keep the engine in good shape, drive at the optimal speed, do not stop too much and avoid crashes and hard brakes!

Keys

W - Speed up

S - Slow down

A,D - Move left and right

Space - Handbrake

C - Toggle cruise control

Esc - Pause Menu

Cruise control

Allows you to set your current speed as the limit.

Vehicle will automatically move at that speed.

Simply use “C” again or slow down/brake controls to disable it.

For in game help, look for the “How To Play” button!

Credits

Programmer - Doruk Bildibay

2D Artist - Ece Çınar

Sound Artist - Yamanefe Ugurlu

Note: All of the content is made by us, during the jam.
